15531.content:
Seven year old Nobisuke Nobi woke up early that morning, wondering why his mother and father were not awake yet. But his father, Dr. Nobita Nobi had been up all night trying to finish a major robotics project for the Tokyo Police Force. His mother Shizuka was still dressed in her street clothes when she came home the night before and passed out on the couch. The meetings she had to attend and the late subway ride home completely wiped her out.

Nobisuke was still hungry though, he thought of waking his mother to cook breakfast, but the last time she did she was so tired she put the egg shells in the pan with the eggs. Suddenly he saw a robot cat walk into the room, it was Doreamon whom Dr. Nobi had rebuilt to try to guide his son toward good behavior. It was not an easy task for Doreamon, as the robot cat was very trusting and Nobisuke was very sly.

"Doreamon! I'm hungry, you got anything to eat!" Nobisuke cried. "No, you ate all the cupcakes the other day." Doreamon scolded him, the robot was hungry as well. Thanks to the 22 century technology that built him, he could keep going on foodstuffs like any normal creature. However he had no idea what to do about their situation as both their hungry bellies rumbled for more food. "Doreamon, don't you have some sort of gadget that we can use to make breakfast?" Nobisuke asked him. "Hmm... let me see." Doreamon said as he dug into his pouch the infamous gadgets he kept in the pouch. As he dug, a metallic wrist band fell out on the floor. "Hey what's that?" Nobisuke asked. "Oh, that's the Super Swapper!" Doreamon said as he continued to look in his pouch. "How does it work?" the young boy asked him. "Oh, it's real simple. I'll show you." the Robot Cat said as it picked up the metallic band. He put it on his right wrist aiming it at Nobisuke. "Hey! What are you doing!" Nobisuke protested as a ray of energy struck him from the metallic band.

He was instantly disoriented then realized he was standing in a differnet place. Before him stood Doreamon, who strangely had his face atop of the body of a young boy. In his confusion, Nobisuke looked down at his hands, and realized they were robotic, but cat like. "Hey, you switched heads with me?" he said at the Robot Cat head that smiled at him from his body. "Yes, you did. The Super Swapper was therapeutic device where in the 22nd century poor people are paired up with those with disabilities and those recovering from serious injury. The Swapper allows them to share bodies so that they both gain self confidence to recover from their situations. Poverty is seen as a disease in the 22nd Century?" Nobisuke recalled with out knowing. "More of a condition that people must recover from", Doreamon added.

Nobisuke thought of the strange metallic band realized suddenly it had the following functions.

The Super Swapper was the metallic band Doreamon was wearing on his around his right wrist. Even though in became invisible when worn, only those with another Super Swapper or 22nd century robotic sense could see it. The device cannot permanently attach itself, however it can be taken off like a wrist watch. The Swapper actually adjusts reality locally after each swap so that everything seems normal, explaining how a boy's head could be attached to a robot cat's body. Any swap can be noticed by anyone else wearing another Super Swapper. If they remove their Super Swapper from their wrist, they will still be aware of the the swaps that happened while they wore it, but will not notice any swaps that happen while they aren't wearing it. The Super Swapper only swaps between it's user and the target.

Nobisuke was able to see the device on Doreamon's wrist. He noticed it had 5 buttons that correspond to the 5 categories of reality alteration it could do, it had a screen on it that displays the options for each swap, 2 arrow buttons to scroll the options on the screen, a button to approve each part of a swap, and the activation button. The Swapper could alter it's self to make more buttons appear and disappear, but that wasn't important now. Nobisuke was to fascinated by the information filling into his brain about the Super Swappper.

He spoke aloud, "It swaps of any of the 4 categories can be all at once or only one or a few. When doing a swap, you select the options before hand, then aim at the target and press the activation button. Whoever it is aimed at when you press the activation button will be swapped with, whether it was the intended target or not. When using the Life and Personality options together, if you switch lives with someone, and then switch personalities with that person while still in their life, you will receive their own original personality instead of the personality of their current life." "Interesting being Robot isn't it" Doreamon said.

"Even though they will be completely aware that the swap happened, switches that affect them mentally such as Personality and certain Life options will have full effect. They will know that they have switched, but how they now act will seem perfectly normal to them. The Super Swapper only works on living things, and certain options do not work on animals." Nobisuke said. "And it works on robot cats like myself from the 22nd century, because it was made to do so. But not on real cats"

"Caution: Very hard impacts, and electrical surges to the device will cause the device to temporarily malfunction, and the device will not always perform the intended swaps and it may choose random options instead. This malfunction does not change how the device works. The Super Swapper shall not swap with someone else with a Super Swapper without their permission." Nobisuke said as he became more fascinated with the device.

"The Super Swap may swap body-parts by charging Clothes with reality alternating energies, so the user can obtain the body parts of the person who last wore the item. In this way the following body part swaps may be made.
Swap Torso - Shirts
Swap Legs - Pants, skirts, shorts
Swap Feet - Shoes, socks, or any footwear
Swap Heads - Glasses, hats
Swap Reproductive Organs - Any lower Undergarments, also bras will cause replacement of chests (Nobisuke blushes when he said this aloud)
Special swamps can be made charging Earrings, Makeup, and other accessories making minor body part swaps. Earrings can swap ears with previous wearing. Eyeliner can swap eyes with the previous user. Lipstick will swap lips with the person who last used it. Tattoos maybe be swapped by charging them on the targets' skin and placing your skin on the tattoo to swap it. Oh that sounds so cool!" Nobisuke exclaimed.

"None of these swaps will work on animals as it's against programing" Nobisuke continued. "That's right" Doreamon said to him.

"Body parts maybe directly targeted and highlighted on the screen. The following swap maybe done. Full Body swaps, Head swaps which replace everything below the user's neck with the target's body. Hairswaps to move the hair from the target onto the user's body, leaving the target with the user's hair. Eye swaps may also be used, though care must be taken to know the target's ability to see. Facial or body hair swaps with targets the user can also execute with out trouble." Nobisuke continued as he smiled. He thought to himself, "Now I can get a mustache or a beard like dad's!"

"The swapping of target's torso, arms, hands, legs, feet, reproductive organs (almost burst out laughing), voice, and skin may easily be done with this device with the user. None of these Body swaps will target animals" Nobisuke said. "Why is that Doreamon?" he stopped to ask the Cat Robot head with his body. "People did too much mischief in my time. So they made the Swapper where it wouldn't select animals as targets." Doremon asked as continued to patiently listen to Nobisuke rattle off the abilities of the device.

"Another ability of the device is Lifeswap. With the reality altering power of Lifeswap, the user may swap first names with a target. Swap skills, such as mechanical, artistic, or mental skills. Swap relationships with target persons to swap placement in families. Swap social status with others. Swap occupation with others as it pertains to work or school. All these swaps may take single, multiple or whole swaps with target. These abilities are to help the user learn valuable lessons and encourage them to see that they have the ability to direct their life. Also Gender can be swapped in two different ways, either the user may actually physically be altered to become the gender of the target he choses, or the user can swap Gender perception where all in the local area will see the user as the opposite gender despite keeping original physical form. Age perception is also available, where others will see the user as the age he obtains from a target person. Also possession my be obtained with this device, provided you have another possession of the same size and weight to swap out with it." Nobisuke said as he listened to himself.

Based on The Last Episode of Doreamon(fanfiction)
http://www.kejut.com/doraemon1

155311.content:
"Seems you can't target two targets and swap between them." Nobisuke asked Doreamon again. "That caused even more trouble than the animal swaps. A person with a device capable of that could cause city wide havoc. In the city of Akita, it was once nick-named "Headswap Town" because a boy misused that device. Any sudden loud sound could cause the populace to suddenly and randomly swap heads. Took years to fix that. Also notice, you can only swap objects with another object. It used to be able to swap bodyparts for objects, but criminals started stealing bodyparts from innocent people. So that was disabled as well." Doreamon explained.

"Personality, Interest swaps, or mannerisms such as posture, way you walk, or speech inflection can be swapped wholly or partially. Wait I am getting this image of Dad as a boy on the body of a GoGo Dancer?" Nobisuke said as he crinkled his face at the image. "Um, that's enough. Let's swap back." Doreamon said as he activated the bracelet restoring their heads to their perspective bodies. "Let me have that bracelet. I've got an idea how to get breakfast" Nobisuke told the Cat Robot. "Really! What's the idea" Doreamon said as he trustingly handed over the bracelet. "You'll see" Nobisuke said as he put the metallic bracelet on his wrist. "You aren't gonna target me?" Doreamon asked nervously. "No, someone that make breakfast!" Nobisuke replied, as he walked over to the couch where his mother was passed out. "Poor Mom. She's so tired. I got an idea how to let her sleep" he said as Doreamon looked closely at the two of them. "What are you doing?" the Robot Cat asked. Nobisuke sat next to his mother on the opposite side of the couch, then pointed the Super Swapper at her and fired it. Suddenly Mrs. Shizuka Nobi's sleeping head was resting on her son's body on the couch. Nobisuke's head and the bracelet transferred over to the rest of Mrs. Nobi's body. The son, now physically his mother from the neck down got up out of the couch. "Ow! Mom's body is so sore! I hope I never get this old!" he said as she stretched his mother's body in an effort to ease the pain. Doreamon rolled his eyes at that comment, Nobisuke would get that old and older according to his records of the 22nd century.

Nobisuke took off his mother's black coat and walked over into the kitchen. He started to prepare the stove to cook. "You sure you should be using the stove!" Doreamon objected. "Relax. I swapped over he ability to cook. I know everything she would know" Nobisuke said as he rapidly put his mother's body into motion to make breakfast.

Dr. Nobi awoke to the sound of the stove going. He got dressed and went down to get breakfast. There he saw his wife Shizuka cooking breakfast still clad in her black blouse and blue mini skirt, wearing an apron over them as she worked the fry pan. He walked over and kissed his wife on the cheek, completely oblivious that his son's countenance was now crowning the top of her neck. "Morning Dad, err... Nobita" Nobisuke replied, he really strained to remember what his mother called his father. "Morning love. You work so hard, then come home to cook breakfast. How did your deal with Kiba Tech go yesterday" he asked her, who was really his son. "Um, it went well I think. I'll know later." Nobisuke said, figuring that was convincing enough. "Alright dear. I know those deals go. Hopefully you will luck out and we can go out and celebrate this week, you know together." Dr. Nobi said as he reached an arm tightly around his wife's waist. Nobisuke made an pleading face to Doreamon, he felt very uncomfortable.

"Nobita! How are you this morning!" Doreamon spoke to the Doctor. "Ah! Doreamon, old friend. Ready to tell me the nature of your current mission this time? I was so surprised when you showed up at our door about a month ago." Dr. Nobi replied "It's good to see you too Doctor. I was very appreciative of your help, it was no fun laying there with my battery drained out." Doreamon replied. "No, I should thank you. Your predicament taught me I had to get off my duff and study. Thanks to you I am the Roboticist I am today. I only wish that you can do the same for our son, right love?" Dr. Nobi said turning back to his wife. "Um right..." Nobisuke said uncomfortably as he realized his father was totally fooled by the device into thinking that Nobisuke was his mother Shizuka. Well technically from the neck down he was, but that was another story and one he was beginning to regret as he continued to make breakfast. "Um, why don't you guys go over to the table to talk? I am almost done cooking here." Nobisuke told them, realizing the advantages of his borrowed identity. "Let's go to the table, Doctor!" Doreamon asked with a smile.

Dr. Nobi and Doreamon sat down as Nobisuke served them with precision of food serving he borrowed from his mother along with her body. "Say, where is Nobisuke! He should be enjoying this breakfast!", Dr. Nobi said as he began to tear into the food. "I'll go get him!", Nobisuke said, taking advantage of the fact that the Swapper had fooled his father into thinking he was his mother. He then walked down to the sofa where his mother Shizuka's head was still asleep on his body. He sat down next to her and with a quick operation of the Super Swapper, he restored his mother and himself back the way they had been. Nobisuke then walked back to the table, now in his own body, and sat down to eat. "Sleeping a little late?" Dr. Nobi chastised him. "A little." Nobisuke said, deciding he would take the blame for oversleeping for his mother today. Then Mrs. Nobi walked over, her eyes still bleary, "Oh! Who made breakfast?" "Um, you did dear!", Dr. Nobi replied to his wife. "I.. I did?" she asked as she searched her memory for any evidence of this, but it was really too early in the morning. She carefully sat down and stared at the eggs she was told she prepared. Her memory of the eggshell incident or the time she was so tired she accidentally substituted Garlic Powder for Parmesan Cheese, the memories of those culinary disasters made her apprehensive to eat. Seeing her husband and her son were enjoying it made her have the courage to try it. It was quite good, just like she would have made it. "I must have been sleep cooking!", Mrs. Nobi remarked as she shoved a mouthful in and began to eat it.

Dr. Nobi, Mrs. Nobi, and Nobisuke got ready for their day. Nobisuke could tell despite the break he gave to his mother earlier, she was still tired and sleepy. She had a big negotiation with Lex Corp, which was suing Kaiba Corp for patent infringement. She always complained when she had to be present at a meeting between Seto Kaiba and Lex Luthor, today would be a long day for her.

Dr. Nobi had much programming to do, his work on the new "Laborer" Project interested Nobisuke, though he disliked his father's assistant Eichi Hoba as he never wanted to talk. He learned from his father, Eichi had been to America and attended Texas A & M. He had little good to say about America, though Nobisuke learned he kept with the Texas A & M Football through his father. Eichi had an icon dedicated to the Fightin' Aggies hanging in his office. Today his father would be getting a visit from a from Magnus Robotics today, and he stayed up all night preparing for presentation for them.

Nobisuke touched his bracelet, he realized he could impersonate either of his parents if he did it right. But maybe he should think of something else.

choices: Veemon successfully swaps bodies with Davis
A thought enters Veemon's mind, causing him to pause
1553221122122221.content:
DemiVeemon stretched and yawned. He had just woken up from a very pleasant dream, involving a thirty-foot tall stuffed Thanksgiving turkey, just for him. He yawned again and looked around the room.

Ever since the Digidestined had defeated MaloMyotismon just a few months ago, his partner, Davis, had actually matured a little. Before that, his room was usually quite messy; with old chips bags, some dirty laundry, ect. just laying everywhere. Now, his room was relatively clean; the only things laying around now being his clothes.

Speaking of Davis, he was currently still sleeping on his bed, snoring up a storm. Davis' newfound maturity had also extended to his attire; instead of the yellow pajamas he used to sleep in, he now wore a white T-shirt and a pair of dark blue boxers.

Looking down at his partner, DemiVeemon thought: 'Ever since MaloMyotismon bit the dust, Davis has been more chipper than ever. He doesn't even slack off as much in school now. He's really enjoying everything he can.'

DemiVeemon sighed. 'You know, it must be nice being a human. Going to school, playing soccer, hanging out with your friends...' He sighed again. 'Sometimes, I really wish that I could be a human, like Davis.'

Any further thoughts from DemiVeemon were interrupted, because at that moment, the screen on Davis' computer started to glow.

'Hey, what's with the lightshow?' thought DemiVeemon, as something came out of the computer screen. When the light died down, DemiVeemon saw what it was. It looked like some sort of armband with a bunch of different buttons.

'What the heck is this thing?' thought DemiVeemon, as he reached out to touch it. The moment that he did touch it, he could feel himself getting stronger and bigger. When the feelings stopped, he had digivolved into Veemon!

'What is going on here?' thought Veemon. 'How did I suddenly digivolve without Davis' help?' Veemon spun around to see if Davis had noticed anything. He hadn't. Davis was the kind of guy who could almost only be woken by his alarm clock. In fact, a herd of stampeding elephants could have passed right by him, without waking him up.

Turning back towards the armband, Veemon reached for it, thinking: 'Now, what exactly are you?' When he touched it this time, he could feel his mind being filled with information about this new device. When he regained his bearings, he held the device up to his face, going over all of the new information in his head.

'So, this thing is called a Super Swapper,' thought Veemon, as he studied it more carefully. As he mentally went over the functions of the Swapper, he smiled as realization dawned on him.

'This is perfect! This is why it caused me to digivolve; so I could used this thing easier!' thought Veemon, as he put the Super Swapper on his right arm. 'Thanks to this little humdinger, I can not just become a human like Davis; I can actually BECOME Davis!!!'

Turning towards his still sleeping partner, Veemon aimed the Super Swapper at Davis and prepared to push the button.

What happens next?
1553221122122221.title: The Super Swapper appears...

choices: He chooses to swap clothes with Davis, but with a slight twist from the norm...
He chooses to swap somthing else with Davis.
15532211221222212.content:
Just before Veemon could press the button, a thought occured to him.

'Wait a minute...' he thought, pausing with his finger just above the button. 'I can't swap bodies with Davis; I don't know the first thing about actually BEING a human! Sure, I know that the Swapper alters reality to make it seem normal, but even so, other people might get suspicious if I end up acting more like a Digimon than a human.'

Lowering his hands, Veemon started to think things through.

'Of course, I could just swap knowledge of how to be human with Davis, but that would be too easy. I want to experience being a human, while still being 'me' mentally and keeping things otherwise normal. Hmmm..... what to do?'

Suddenly, an idea popped into his head. 'I've got it! I'll simply make due with just swapping one aspect of being a human, between Davis and me! That way, I can get used to that one thing, before I swap another! Yeah, that's it!'

Veemon once more looked over at the sleeping Davis.

'Now, what human aspect should I swap with Davis?' Veemon thought long and hard about this. Finally, he thought he had an answer. 'What about if I swap clothes between Davis and me? Wearing clothes is something that I've never tried, so that would be something I would have to get used to. Plus,' Veemon sniggered, 'watching Davis go about his day in the nude, without anyone finding it weird, is just too funny to pass up!'

What does Veemon choose?
15532211221222212.title: A good point

choices: He's waited long enough; he informs Davis that he's wearing 'his' clothes
He has patience; he waits until Davis finds out himself, and freaks out
155322112212222121.content:
'Yeah, I think getting used to wearing clothes takes priority over other things,' decided Veemon. Aiming the Super Swapper once more at Davis, Veemon got ready to press the 'clothes swap' button. However, before he could, another thought occured to him.

'Hold on! According to the information about the Super Swapper, if I press that button, then I'll get Davis' clothes. The problem is, that the clothes will be altered to suit me perfectly. That won't do! I want to become a human, sure, but I don't want that drastic a change right now. If I want to get used to wearing human clothes, then I shouldn't alter them. Otherwise, they would be Digimon clothes instead of human clothes. Besides, it just wouldn't be as funny! No, I'll have to think of a way to get it as I want it.'

Veemon thought hard about his little dilemma for about five minutes. Then he got an idea. Fiddling a little with the buttons on the Super Swapper, he finally found the setting he was looking for. He then aimed the Super Swapper at Davis and pressed the button he'd found. When the flash from the swap died down, nothing appeared to have been changed; Davis was still sleeping soundly in his bed, still wearing his clothes and Veemon was still standing on the desk, pointing the Super Swapper at Davis. But Veemon really had swapped something.

To keep Davis' clothes from being altered to suit him, Veemon had instead chosen to swap simple ownership of the clothes, with Davis. That way, the clothes all stayed at their regular size, yet they all now belonged to Veemon!

Lowering his arm, Veemon heard Davis' alarm clock ringing. 'Whew, just in time!' thought Veemon, as Davis began to stir. 'Now, if all went according to plan, even though they are still human-sized, Davis should think that all of his clothes are really mine now.'

As Davis sat up, groggy from having just woken up, Veemon thought: 'Perhaps I should call Davis out on him wearing 'my' clothes and see his reaction! Then again, it just might be funnier, if he was allowed to notice it himself!'

What does Veemon choose?
155322112212222121.title: A little twist from the usual clothes swapping...

1553221122122221211.content:
While Davis was streching out, Veemon was making a decision.

'Nah, why wait?' he thought. 'I'm curious to see if that gizmo actually worked and depending on how Davis takes it, will tell me if it did.'

Davis was in the middle of a yawn, when Veemon put his plan into effect.

'Here goes nothing,' he thought, before he exclaimed: "Davis!!!"

Davis, still groggy, looked over at him.

"Whassup, Veemon?" he drawled. "How'd you digivolve?"

"Never mind that!" exclaimed Veemon. He thought: 'I hope that Super Swapper worked,' before he continued pretend-yelling at Davis: "Would you mind telling me why you are wearing my clothes?!"

"What're you talking about Veemon?" said Davis sleepily. When Veemon simply pointed down in respone, Davis looked down at himself. It took a few seconds for him to properly register everything, but when he did, he jumped up with a yelp of shock, all traces of tiredness completely vanished.

"Aaaaahh!!! You're right Veemon!" exclaimed Davis. "How did I end up wearing your clothes?!?"

'What do you know; that Swapper-thingy worked!' thought Veemon to himself exitedly, while out loud, he pretended to still be angry at Davis, by yelling: "I don't care how you got them on, just get them off, now!"

"O-of course, Veemon!," stuttered Davis, as he frantically began to take off the T-shirt and boxers.

Although Veemon looked angry on the outside, on the inside he was doing cartwheels out of excitement. 'It really worked!' he thought. 'Thanks to that Super Swapper, Davis' clothes are now all mine and no one finds it weird at all!'

By this point, Davis had managed to take off both the white T-shirt and the dark blue boxers, leaving him completely in the nude. Still pretending to be slightly miffed at him, Veemon said: "Now, could you please explain to me why you were wearing my clothes in the first place?"

"I honestly have no idea, Veemon," said Davis. "I'm certain that I went to bed as normal last night; so I don't know why I was suddenly wearing your clothes."

'I know why,' sniggered Veemon mentally.

"Well, we can figure out how this happened, later; I have to get ready for shcool," said Davis and as he threw the T-shirt and the boxers over to Veemon, who caught them, he added: "You'd better hurry and get dressed, Veemon.'

"Me?"

"Well, duh! They are your clothes after all!" said Davis and crossed his arms. "Besides, it just wouldn't be decent of YOU to stroll around naked, even inside the house. Don't you remember the time when you tried to go out naked like me, and all those people ended up calling you a pervert?"

"Oh, right! I forgot!" Veemon played along. But secretly, he was impressed with just how much the Super Swapper had altered reality.

"Now, hurry up and get your clothes on, Veemon; I have to get ready for shcool," said Davis, still buck-naked, before he walked into the kitchen, leaving Veemon, still holding the T-shirt and boxers, alone in his room.

What happens next?
1553221122122221211.title: Davis now thinks he's supposed to be naked...

choices: He chooses the white T-shirt and dark blue boxers from before
Veemon chooses some other articles of clothing
15532211221222212112.content:
Veemon stood for a minute, still holding the T-shirt and the boxers.

'Should I really put these on now?' he thought. 'Thanks to that Super Swapper altering reality, all of Davis' clothes have become mine now, so I suppose I should put them on.'

Veemon thought more about it, before he made a decision.

'Nah, it can wait,' he thought, letting the clothes fall to the floor. 'I'd rather observe Davis as much as possible before he leaves for school. I don't want to miss one moment of this funny situation. I can put on the clothes once Davis leaves.'

Veemon walked over to the door and peeked out. He had to cover his mouth with his hands, so he wouldn't end up laughing loudly at what he saw.

Davis was sitting buck-naked at the kitchen table, eating his usual breakfast cerial. Veemon of course knew that this was normal for Davis in this altered reality, but that didn't stop it from being funny.

'Amazing!' thought Veemon. 'Davis is just going about his morning rutine as always, exept that he's now naked and he thinks that's perfectly normal for him! This is hilarious!!!' Veemon had to really restrain himself from bursting out laughing. 'It's a good thing that Davis and I are the only ones here at the moment; otherwise I'd never be able to get away with spying on him like this.'

Indeed, Davis and Veemon were currently the only two individuals in the apartment. Davis' mom and sister were out of town at the moment, visiting a sick aunt of theirs. Surprisingly, Davis had actually managed to follow the instructions that his mother had left quite well, even as far as the food went.

Speaking of food, Davis had finished eating his cerial. He walked over to the dishwasher and put his plate in it. Veemon then observed the naked Davis walking across the room and entering the bathroom. Judging from the sounds coming from in there, Davis was in the middle of brushing his teeth.

'I still can't believe it,' thought Veemon, still trying his best not to laugh. 'Davis is walking around completely naked and he doesn't find anything odd about it at all! That Super Swapper is really impressive!'

Veemon ducked back inside Davis' room, when he heard Davis finishing up in the bathroom. A few moments later, Davis walked in.

"Whoa, Veemon!" he said when he saw his partner. "How come you're still not dressed yet?"

"Er... Just haven't decided on what outfit I should wear, I guess," fibbed Veemon. He found it harder and harder to bite back the laughter, but he managed it.

"Well, just don't take too long," said Davis, as he found his school-books and made to put them in his backpack. "I don't want to come home and find that the police arrested you for 'public indecency', Veemon."

At those words, Veemon had to quickly cover both his mouth and nose with his hands, to prevent a laughing-fit, although he still let out a definite snort of laughter. Davis didn't notice however, as he was busy staring at something in his backpack.

"What's up, Davis?" asked Veemon.

Davis looked at Veemon with a slightly guilty expression and said: "Uh... Veemon? I swear, I have no idea how it happened, but..." He then pulled out several things from the backpack; a red T-shirt with a white number '18' on the back of it, a white pair of shorts with a red stripe down the side, long white socks with a red stripe near the top, and a pair of red, white and black sports-shoes. It was Davis' soccer uniform.

Davis continued: "Honestly , Veemon, I don't know how your soccer clothes ended up in my backpack."

"My soccer clothes?" Veemon was confused. "But I don't play soccer."

"Duh, of course not!" said the naked Davis as he put on the backpack. "But, you do like to wear them at all of my soccer matches, right? So you can better 'live myself into the game'! Those were your words, right?"

"Right, right, of course! I was just messing with you," lied Veemon. He seemed casual enough, but as soon as Davis turned away from him, Veemon had to grab one of the pillows from the bed and giggle into it. The whole situation was becoming so ridiculous, that Veemon almost couldn't hold back his amusement anymore. Quick as a flash, he placed the pillow back on the bed, before Davis turned back towards him.

"Well, I'm off to school now," he said. "Just don't forget to put some clothes on. Okay, Veemon?"

"Yeah, I got it, Davis," said Veemon, straining to keep up his calm facade.

"Alright then!" said Davis as he walkedout of the room. "See you after school!" Veemon heard the front door open and close.

Veemon quickly ran over to the window and looked outside. It wasn't long before he could see Davis walk out into the street.

To Veemon, the entire scene was absurd; although Davis clearly passed by a bunch of people down at the street, not one of those people as much as lifted an eyebrow, when the 11-year old nude boy wearing just a backpack, passed by them. Everyone in the world, apart from Veemon, just found it perfectly normal!

Upon seeing this, Veemon could no longer restrain himself. He fell on his back and roared with laughter as he rolled around on the floor, guffawing hysterically like he had just been told the funniest joke of all time.

'UNBELIEVEABLE!!!' he thought between bursts of laughter. 'Not one of the humans down there spared a second glance at Davis; even though he was walking around buck-naked!!! I love this Super Swapper!!!'

Finally composing himself, Veemon got back on his feet.

'Well, that was fun,' he thought. 'But now that the fun is over, I'd better get down to buissness. Because I used the Super Swapper to alter reality, I'm the one who's supposed to wear clothes now.' He looked at the many articles of clothing scattered around the room. 'The only question now is: What should I wear?'

What does Veemon choose?

15532222111.content:
Akane 's morning jog was derailed by when a strange device caught her eye... It Looked kinda like a watch but way more high tech, like something out of a sci-fi anime. Curious she crouched down and picked it up to give it a closer look. seven buttons and a screen. Clothing, Body, Life, Personality, Activate, and two arrows pointing opposite ways

"What kind of watch is this?" She murmured hitting one of the named buttons only to have the screen read 'Device Locked. Please wear before activation.'... She looked around briefly on the empty side street for anyone who may have dropped it but she was the only one there. Unable to halt her curiosity she rolled up her sleeve and placed the metal band on her wrist and it fastened itself on securely. 'Device Lock Lifted. Awaiting Input.' the screen read for a moment before going blank. With a curious noise she began fiddling with the buttons and looking through the options.

"Swapping... This keeps talking about swapping things. But these options aren't working... No valid targets? " she stood up fully and looked around. "Does that mean I need to pick another person and... swap with them?" that would make sense... what didn't was many of the options she'd seen on there... swapping body parts? Lives? personality traits? it was just so unreal... Maybe it was just some toy from an anime or something? There was only one way to find out really. "Oh shoot, I need to get back home to get ready for school."

The rest of the run, her mind was dominated by the possibilities and what ifs. The metal band feeling heavy on her wrist with the possibilities. Arriving home to the smell of breakfast cooking she greeted to room with a cheerful. "I'm back!" Receiving a nod and a smile from her father and grunt of acknowledgement from the Panda across the shogi board from him. Nabiki offered a blearly wave, still waking up from a late night doing whatever she got up to... Kasumi peeked out from the kitchen.

"You took a lot longer with run then usual." she said sounding somewhat concerned. "Breakfast is nearly ready"

"I got a little sidetracked sorry." she said with a slight flush of embarrassment. "I'll just have to skip my morning training in the dojo for today. I'll just take a quick bath to clean up."

"Okay, ."

"Thanks for the heads up." She smiled as she watched her sister turn and head back to the stove... her mind turned back to the device on her wrist. Her gaze shifted between the kitchen and the front table. She pulled her sleeve up and bit her lips. Now she had some valid targets...
15532222111.title: Akane Tendo

choices: Akane decides to give it a proper test run at school
It seems too dangerous, best get rid of it somehow
Someone Barges into the Bathroom without Knocking(Typical)
155322221111.content:
This was her chance to see if this thing was real. She licked her lips as she started toward the bathroom hiding her wrist from the others and pressing through the options. It seemed it was limited to who was in visual range as Kasumi wasn't appearing among the valid targets despite being just a little ways off in the Kitchen. She settled on Nabiki and after a moment's hesitation confirmed her option. Reality seemed to skip for a moment before she felt hair tickling the nape of her neck. pulling a lock in front of her eyes she saw brown hair.... it worked. Then that would mean...

She peeks around the corner to see her sister drowsily reading a magazine, her own short cropped blue hair on her head. Moreover no one seemed to notice the change. Her father, ever on to overreact to the slightest thing, was looking right at Nabiki before going back to his game with no reaction at all. Akane looked down to the wrist device with wonder and a small bit of fear. She could swap anything this watch would let her... and no one would even know? She swallowed heavily and quickly swapped her hair back before skulking off to the bathroom, mind buzzing with possibilities.

She changed out of her clothes, too distracted to even lock the door behind her. Slipping into the bath she sets the watch onto the sid eof the tub, staring at it. Should she tell someone? If the others found out it would no doubt turn into a Chaotic mess as it usually did when magical items got involved... so should she just use it than? It could solve so many problems... but it could cause just as many.

info.brief_description: A device called the Super Swapper in anime
info.description:
Created in conjunction with Some Random Person. Be sure to check out his version.

The same as his, but instead in the world of anime.

The Super Swapper
-It is a metalic band worn around the wrist. While worn, only those with another Super Swapper can see it. The device is not attatched, and can be taken off.
-Reality adjusts after each swap so that everything seems normal. Swaps are only noticed by those with a Super Swapper. If they take off the Super Swapper, they will still be aware of the the swaps that happened while they wore it, but will not notice any swaps that happen while they don't wear it.
-Swaps are between the user and the target.
-The device has a 5 buttons that correspond to the 5 categories, a screen on it that displays the options for each swap, and 2 arrow buttons to scroll the options on the screen, a button to approve each part of a swap, and the activation button.
-Swaps of any of the 4 categories can be all at once or only one or a few.
-When doing a swap, you select the options before hand, then aim at the target and press the activation button. Whoever it is aimed at when you press the activation button will be swapped with, whether it was the intended target or not.
-When using the Life and Personality options together, if you switch lives with someone, and then switch personalities with that person while still in their life, you will recieve their own original personality instead of the personality of their current life.
-Even though they will be completely aware that the swap happened, switches that affect them meantally such as Personality and certain Life options will have full effect. They will know that they have switched, but how they now act will seem perfectly normal to them.
-The Super Swapper only works on living things, and certain options do not work on animals.
-Very hard impacts, and electrical surges to the device will cause the device to temporarily malfunction, and the device will not always perform the intended swaps and it may choose random options instead. This malfunction does not change how the device works.
-The Super Swapper can not swap with someone else with a Super Swapper without their permission.


Clothes:
Torso - Shirts
Legs - Pants, skirts
Footwear - Shoes, socks
Headwear - Glasses, hats
Underwear - For women, bra also counts as part of this
Accessories - Makeup, jewlery
Tattoos

Clothing swaps do not work on animals

Body:
Head
Hair
Eyes
Facial Hair
Body Hair
Torso
Arms
Hands
Legs
Feet
Genitals
Voice
Skin

Body swaps do not work on animals

Life:
First Name
Skills - Single, Multiple, or All
Relationships - Friends and/or family - Single, Multiple, or All
Status - Popularity, The way people generally think of you
Occupation - Pertains to work and school - Single, Multiple, or All
Gender - Version 1 makes it so thar it does not actually change their gender, but makes other perceive them as that gender. Version 2 makes it
Age - Does not actually change your age, but makes others perceive you as that age
Possessions - Things you own, other than clothing - Single, Multiple, or All

Personality:
Interests - Single, Multiple, or All
Mannerisms - Posture, way you walk, way you talk

If you have ideas for extra options, please ask first, and if approved will be added to the list.

No sex
No killing off characters
No ending the story
No one option paths. Always leave at least two options
Try to have good grammar.
While its okay in early parts of the story, as it goes on, no one line additions. Try to write at least a paragraph
Keep thing consistent with what happened in the path, and read to make sure you don't contradict things before you post
